div.div: Schools Closed for the remainder of the school year.

div.h6: Schools Closed for the remainder of the school year.

div.h4: Families First Coronavirus Response Act (FFCRA) / Employee Rights Flyer
The US Department of Labor has issued the following advisories and Q & A sheets
div.p: All job openings are posted on School Spring web site. See below.
The Freetown-Lakeville Regional School District will be accepting applications/resumes through School Spring only. No applications or resumes will be accepted on paper or other electronic formats.

p.em: Please note: Applications will be accepted for open positions only. Unsolicited

br.em: applications/resumes will be not be considered for future positions or retained by us.

div.p:
All request for public records will be submitted to:
Richard Medeiros, Superintendent of Schools
rmedeiros@freelake.org
